author: rdonkin
msg: Added support to the xml rules for non-propagation of exceptions. This will (when the correct options are set) allow a digestion to continue when an object creation has failed.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added support for non-propagation of exceptions. This will (when the correct options are set) allow a digestion to continue when an object creation has failed

author: rdonkin
msg: Added support in the loader for digesting using xml from java.util.Reader.

author: rdonkin
msg: Fix for bug #16350. This adds another kind of wildcard match - and ancester tail match. This allows matching patterns such as a/b/*. Based on a patch submitted by Kelvin Tan

author: tobrien
msg: Added patch with tests for bean-property-setter-rule
